evidence.claim: Right At Home Anne Arundel County emphasizes adherence to HIPAA regulations in their communications.
The company provides services that may involve handling healthcare data and thus mentions compliance with standards like HL7.
They provide resources emphasizing the importance of secure handling of client health data, suggesting they use secure data platforms.
No specific technical API or cloud services were identified, indicating a minimal online presence regarding technical infrastructure.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction use or API automation on public site.
